This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 0 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 0. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1. This is because VkVertexInputBindingDescription struct at index 1 of pVertexBindingDescriptions has a binding value of 1.
